GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: This project is retrieved from API site:http://192.168.52.132/redcap_service/

Description.TranslatedText: Participant ID
Please enter your Study ID number and check it is correctly entered. This can be found on letters we have sent you about the study

This is a check on your Study ID entry. Please only attempt the questionnaire if there is a 1 or 2 in the box once you have entered your Study ID above. If you are completing online you should have a 1 or a 3 in this box. If you are seeing a researcher to enroll you should have a 2 or a 4. Please contact us if this is not the case.
Please enter your date of birth
Are you male or female?
Where were you born?
What year did you first come to live in the United Kingdom?
What is your ethnic group?
Please enter your ethnic group
What is your father's ethnic group?
Please enter your father's ethnic group
What is your mother's ethnic group?
Please enter your mother's ethnic group
Do you smoke tobacco now? (this includes shisha, cigarettes, cigars, cigarillos and pipes)
How often do you smoke tobacco?
In your lifetime, have you smoked a total of at least 100 times?
How old were you when you first started smoking? (if you do not remember exactly, please provide the closest age)
How old were you when you first started smoking on most or all days? (if you do not remember exactly, please provide the closest age)
What type(s) of tobacco do you smoke? (Tick any that apply)
How many cigarettes do you smoke in a typical WEEK?
Please put a number on how many cigarettes you smoke in a typical WEEK?
How many ounces of tobacco do you use for hand-rolled cigarettes or pipe per WEEK? (There are 28 grammes in 1 ounce)
How many cigars/cigarillos do you smoke per WEEK?
Which of the following best describes your shisha smoking?
Approximately how many shishas did you smoke in the previous MONTH?
On average, how many shishas do you smoke DAILY?
At what age did you start shisha smoking? (if you do not remember exactly, please provide the closest age)
Do you usually share the same shisha with others?
Prior to cigars/cigarillos/pipes or shisha, did you smoke cigarettes on most or all days?
Prior to smoking cigars/cigarillos/pipes or shisha, how many cigarettes did you smoke in a typical WEEK?
Please put a number on how many cigarettes you used to smoke in a typical WEEK, prior to smoking cigars/cigarillos/pipes or shisha.
How old were you when you last smoked cigarettes (include hand-rolled cigarettes if smoked) on most or all days? (if you do not remember exactly, please provide the closest age)
How soon after waking up do you smoke your first tobacco of the day?
How easy or difficult would you find it to go without smoking for a whole day?
Have you ever tried to give up smoking?
How many times have you tried to give up smoking?
How many times have you stopped smoking for at least 6 months?
What method(s) did you use to stop smoking when you stopped for more than 6 months?
Which of the following nicotine replacement therapy products have you used? (you can select more than one products)
Which other nicotine replacement therapy product(s) have you used?
What other method(s) did you use to stop smoking when you stopped for more than 6 months?
Compared to 10 years ago do you smoke?
Why did you reduce your smoking?
How old were you when you first started smoking on most or all days? (if you do not remember exactly, please provide the closest age)
What type(s) of tobacco did you smoke? (Tick any that apply)
How many cigarettes did you smoke in a typical WEEK?
Please put a number on how many cigarettes you used to smoke in a typical WEEK?
How many ounces of tobacco do you use for hand-rolled cigarettes or pipe per WEEK? (There are 28 grammes in 1 ounce)
How many cigars/cigarillos did you smoke per WEEK?
Which of the following best described your shisha smoking?
Approximately how many shishas did you smoke in a MONTH?
On average, how many shishas did you smoke DAILY?
At what age did you start shisha smoking? (if you do not remember exactly, please provide the closest age)
Did you usually share the same shisha with others?
Prior to cigars/cigarillos/pipes/shisha smoking, did you smoke cigarettes on most or all days?
How many cigarettes did you smoke in a typical WEEK when you were also smoking cigars/cigarillos/pips or shisha?
Please put a number on how many cigarettes you used to smoke in a typical WEEK when you were also smoking cigars/cigarillos/pips or shisha?
How old were you when you last smoked cigarettes (include hand-rolled cigarettes if smoked) on most or all days? (if you do not remember exactly, please provide the closest age)
How soon after waking up did you smoke your first tobacco of the day?
How old were you when you last smoked at all? (if you do not remember exactly, please enter the closest age)
Why did you stop smoking? (you can select more than one answer)
What method(s) did you use to stop smoking?
Which of the following nicotine replacement therapy products have you used? (you can select more than one product)
Which other nicotine replacement therapy product(s) have you used?
What other method(s) did you use to stop smoking?
How many times did your try to give up smoking before you were successful?
In the time that you smoked, did you ever stop for more than 6 months?
How many times did you stop for more than 6 months?
What method(s) did you use to stop smoking before you were successful?
Which of the following nicotine replacement therapy products did you use? (you can select more than one product)
Which other nicotine replacement therapy product(s) did you use?
What other method(s) did you use to stop smoking before you were successful?
Do you/have you ever smoked electronic cigarettes?
Is/was this in addition to other tobacco products or instead of them?
How often do you/did you smoke electronic cigarettes?
How many cartridges do you/did you use per WEEK?
Do you/have you ever smoked an electronic shisha (shisha pen)?
Is/was this in addition to other tobacco products or instead of them?
How often do you/did you smoke electronic shisha?
How many cartridges do you/did you use per WEEK?
Do other members of your household smoke?
At home, about how many hours per WEEK are you exposed to other people's tobacco smoke? (The time spent in an enclosed space in the company of someone who is actively smoking.)
Outside of your home, about how many hours per WEEK are you exposed to other people's tobacco smoke? (The time spent in an enclosed space in the company of someone who is actively smoking.)
How often do you drink alcohol?
Did you previously drink alcohol?
In an average MONTH, how many glasses [standard glass (125ml)] of unfortified wine would you drink? (there are 6 glasses in an average bottle; include red, white and rose wine)
In an average MONTH, how many glasses of fortified wine would you drink? (there are 12 glasses in an average bottle; fortified wines include drinks such as sherry, port, vermouth)
In an average MONTH, how many pints of beer or cider would you drink? (include bitter, lager, stout, ale, Guinness)

In an average MONTH, how many measures of spirits or liqueurs would you drink? (there are 25 standard measures in a normal sized bottle; spirits include drinks such as whisky, gin, rum, vodka, brandy)
In an average MONTH, how many bottles (330ml) of other alcoholic drinks such as alcopops would you drink?
Did you drink alcohol last week?
Wine including red, white and rose
Fortified wine such as sherry, port, vermouth
Spirits or liqueurs such as whisky, gin, rum, vodka, brandy
Beer or cider such as bitter, lager, stout, ale, Guinness
Other alcoholic drinks such as alcopops
Other alcoholic drinks

Please enter your current weight (please select preferred units)
[Measure your weight in the morning in light clothing and without wearing shoes. Place the scales on firm flooring (such as tiles or wood) rather than carpet.]
Please enter your current weight in Kilogrammes.
Check on weight - if it says '0' please go back a question and check your entry
Please enter your current weight in stones & pounds eg 8s12

Please enter your current waist circumference (please select preferred units)
[Place the tape provided directly on the skin or on no more than one layer of light clothing. The correct place to measure your waist is horizontally halfway between your lowest rib and the top of your hipbone. This is roughly in line with your belly button. Breathe out normally and take the measure. Make sure the tape is snug, without squeezing the skin.]
Please enter your current waist circumference to the nearest cm
Please enter your current waist circumference to the nearest inch eg 37

Please enter your current height (please select preferred units)
[If you do not know your height, measure it without shoes and with hair down. Place the tape at a wall on a flat floor. Stand with your back as straight as possible and feet against the wall in front of the tape. Ask someone to read the measurement, or mark the wall above your head and then measure it.]
Please enter your current height to the nearest centimetre eg 171
Please enter your current height to the nearest inch eg 67
Are you registered with a GP practice in Leicester city or the county
Please select the name of the medical practice you are registered with as a patient. (The practices have been ordered by post code area)
Please select the name of the medical practice you are registered with as a patient. (The practices have been ordered by post code area)
Please select the name of the medical practice you are registered with as a patient. (The practices have been ordered by post code area)
Please enter the name of the medical practice you are registered with
What is the name of the doctor you usually like to see at this practice?
What is the name of the road the medical practice you told us about above is on?
Complete?
